headline: The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (PNC) Enters 2026 With Momentum as Oppenheimer Highlights Growth Drivers
summary: The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (NYSE:PNC) is included among Dividend Contenders List: Top 20 Stocks. On January 20, Oppenheimer raised its price target on The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (NYSE:PNC) to $284 from $268 and kept an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm said PNC ended 2025 on a strong note, and […]
